From: Internal News <ONE.Chalhoub@chalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2024-10-22 17:01
Subject: Performance Booster Month is here, The Group was awarded 'Platinum Category' by Dubai Chambers, Christofle Boutique Grand Opening, Chalhoub Excellence Awards, Coffee with Wassim, Elite Lounge x Swarovski, Kudo Cards in India & Laura...
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/f1LzacBwl0uH1TvLYITJ5w/544502/4C7433AD8F37E0FA9D7A0F760761734E/top-banner-eng.png> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/f1LzacBwl0uH1TvLYITJ5w/550524/B0EA94CA50C464DD16FFDDC623356CA4/edfb-njimage001.png> 	

PERFORMANCE BOOSTER MONTH IS HERE


Performance Booster Month offers a series of virtual Power Hours packed with valuable insights to strengthen your skills. 

These sessions will cover essential topics such as navigating the year-end process, leveraging feedback, leading impactful conversations, and ensuring objectivity and fairness in performance management. Internal guest speakers will also join some sessions to share their expertise.

Don’t miss out—keep an eye on your inbox for invitations and details!

chunks.text:
These sessions will cover essential topics such as navigating the year-end process, leveraging feedback, leading impactful conversations, and ensuring objectivity and fairness in performance management. Internal guest speakers will also join some sessions to share their expertise.

Don’t miss out—keep an eye on your inbox for invitations and details!

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/f1LzacBwl0uH1TvLYITJ5w/544604/5F6BD61E8BBE1ECD17827C80FB2319F9/nuggets-03.png> 	

THE GROUP WAS AWARDED PLATINUM CATEGORY BY DUBAI CHAMBERS

The Group was awarded 'Platinum Category' by Dubai Chambers which stands as a milestone in our long-standing strategic partnership with UAE's leading government entities. The award was presented to Andreu Marco and Nasser AlBlooshi where our contributions in operations and commitment to the UAE economy were applauded. 

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/f1LzacBwl0uH1TvLYITJ5w/550526/836966370C6D121D26CD06CB1CCE28E0/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-50.gif> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/f1LzacBwl0uH1TvLYITJ5w/544518/EA5451AEC8C1A8A08E231DEEFE8086E5/nuggets-10.png> 	

CHRISTOFLE BOUTIQUE GRAND OPENING IN DUBAI MALL

<https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/f1LzacBwl0uH1TvLYITJ5w/550526/836966370C6D121D26CD06CB1CCE28E0/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-50.gif> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/f1LzacBwl0uH1TvLYITJ5w/544518/EA5451AEC8C1A8A08E231DEEFE8086E5/nuggets-10.png> 	

CHRISTOFLE BOUTIQUE GRAND OPENING IN DUBAI MALL

The grand opening of the Christofle flagship boutique took place at the Dubai Mall earlier this month. The event emphasized the store's innovative and beautiful new concept, inspired by the boutique in Paris, while showcasing the exclusive Dubai Mood Skyline Cutlery Set, Christofle’s jewelry line, and the launch of the Vintage Collection, which is exclusive to the Dubai Flagship in the region.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/f1LzacBwl0uH1TvLYITJ5w/550534/06FD3A4A2C30494BF5D3EA9556801D69/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-59.gif> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/f1LzacBwl0uH1TvLYITJ5w/545176/85F9E1F7567DC4AB60E8B5B76FDDE8B7/nuggets-40.png> 	

NOMINATIONS ARE NOW OPEN

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/f1LzacBwl0uH1TvLYITJ5w/550525/3AF3B0965BF3029B5782FDA1214A75F7/banner-43.png> 	
It is time to recognise your successes and the contributions that made a difference. We encourage everyone to participate and highlight the great work happening within our teams.

NOMINATE NOW

Nominations will be open to all team members until November 22nd.

NOMINATE NOW

Did you know? Skincare is the fastest-growing segment within the beauty category. 

Join our professional panel discussion at The Skincare Edition: Unfiltered, where CEOs of leading brands and retail leaders will explore the key factors driving this growth and the innovations shaping the industry's future.

COFFEE WITH WASSIM

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/f1LzacBwl0uH1TvLYITJ5w/549433/3313A052F911679EB07CAA448C355A00/untitled-design-55.png> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/f1LzacBwl0uH1TvLYITJ5w/544536/874CDB8153DC9F2C9B83E6F34C73B87E/nuggets-22.png> 	

COFFEE WITH WASSIM

Earlier this month, team members had the opportunity to connect with Wassim Eid, President of People and Culture, over coffee, where they engaged in meaningful conversations, shared personal stories, and networked in an open and transparent setting. Look out for future opportunities to engage with our leaders beyond their roles!

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/f1LzacBwl0uH1TvLYITJ5w/550528/084B9B805B5560FC6332CC00B801424B/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-14.gif> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/f1LzacBwl0uH1TvLYITJ5w/544531/52D6CD8730A78EDF58F9DC0B5DB4E090/nuggets-46.png> 	

ELITE LOUNGE X SWAROVSKI FIRST PARTNERSHIP

Swarovski celebrated the launch of Swarovski Created Diamonds with an exclusive event in collaboration with Elite Lounge. Guests enjoyed VIP sessions showcasing the artistry of stunning laboratory-grown diamonds in a luxurious atmosphere filled with extravagant jewelry, inspiring insights from an IGI guest speaker and more.

Swarovski celebrated the launch of Swarovski Created Diamonds with an exclusive event in collaboration with Elite Lounge. Guests enjoyed VIP sessions showcasing the artistry of stunning laboratory-grown diamonds in a luxurious atmosphere filled with extravagant jewelry, inspiring insights from an IGI guest speaker and more.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/f1LzacBwl0uH1TvLYITJ5w/550527/0636AF6428DABBF31D1216BE4E24AE98/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-11.gif> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/f1LzacBwl0uH1TvLYITJ5w/545543/FC5BB79B602192ABC29610D460925277/nuggets-51.png> 	

RECOGNISING OUR TEAM MEMBERS IN INDIA WITH KUDO CARDS

Last quarter, we introduced Kudo Cards in India as part of our informal recognition programme. Team members are now celebrating each other's efforts across the workplace with instant recognition!

From acknowledging small wins to celebrating everyday contributions, these cards have fostered a culture of continuous appreciation. 

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/f1LzacBwl0uH1TvLYITJ5w/550529/932CE1D265BA651BE6167A6716774283/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-15.gif> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/f1LzacBwl0uH1TvLYITJ5w/545322/4210EEB901BE6A1E395CD17A621B8955/nuggets-56.png> 	

LATEST NEWS FROM LAURA MERCIER

<https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/f1LzacBwl0uH1TvLYITJ5w/550529/932CE1D265BA651BE6167A6716774283/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-15.gif> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/f1LzacBwl0uH1TvLYITJ5w/545322/4210EEB901BE6A1E395CD17A621B8955/nuggets-56.png> 	

LATEST NEWS FROM LAURA MERCIER

Laura Mercier & Buxom recently held a training session called Fall Atelier focusing on 2025 novelties. The event celebrated our beauty advisor team with recognition prizes, featured an engaging makeup workshop, and highlighted our marketing successes.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/f1LzacBwl0uH1TvLYITJ5w/550530/2073513BFB650D50B2E4270CA1D8FDA7/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-16.gif> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/f1LzacBwl0uH1TvLYITJ5w/550532/FCC72DE5381B4A225CE37388134DCF8D/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-17.gif> 	
Laura Mercier recently made a splash at the Sephora Beauty Hubs, offering free goodies and samples while launching their new Caviar Eye Sticks and Caviar Mascara. Additionally, influencers were invited to a masterclass, where they could experience and learn Laura Mercier’s signature makeup techniques firsthand.

For inquiries, please get in touch with us at Internal.Communications@chalhoub.com and to share your news in the Internal News please contact Yasmine.Uthman@chalhoub.com
